content: संपद् {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To turn out well, succeed, prosper, be accomplished or fulfilled; संपत्स्यते वः कामोऽयं कालः काश्चित्प्रतीक्ष्यतां <ls>Ku. 2. 54</ls>; <ls>R. 14. 76</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 254</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">6. 69.</ls> {@--2@} To be completed, to amount to (as a number); त्र्याहताः पंच पंचदश संपद्यंते. {@--3@} To turn out to be, become; संपत्स्यंते नभसि भवतो राजहंसाः सहायाः <ls>Me. 11</ls>, <ls n="Me.">23</ls>; संपेदे श्रमसलिलोद्गमो विभूषा <ls>Ki. 7. 5.</ls> {@--4@} To arise, be born or produced. {@--5@} To fall or come together, unite. {@--6@} To be provided or furnished with, be possessed of; अशोक यदि सद्य एव कुसुमैर्न संपत्स्यसे <ls>M. 3. 16</ls>; see संपन्न. {@--7@} To tend to, bring about, produce (with <ab>dat.</ab>); साधोः शिक्षा गुणाय संपद्यते नासाधोः <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; <ls>Mu. 3. 32.</ls> {@--8@} To obtain, attain to, acquire, get. {@--9@} To enter into, be absorbed in (with <ab>loc.</ab>). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to happen, bring about, produce, accomplish, fulfil, effect; इति स्वसुर्भोजकुलप्रदीपः संपाद्य पाणिग्रहणं स राजा <ls>R. 7. 29.</ls> {@--2@} To procure, obtain, make ready, prepare. {@--3@} To obtain, acquire, attain to. {@--4@} To furnish, provide, endow with. {@--5@} To change or transform into. {@--6@} To make an agreement.

संपद् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Wealth, riches; नीताविवोत्साहगुणेन संपद् <ls>Ku. 1. 22</ls>; आपन्नार्तिप्रशमनफलाः संपदो ह्युत्तमानां <ls>Me. 53.</ls> {@--2@} Prosperity, affluence, advancement; (<ab>opp.</ab> विपद् or आपद्); ते भृत्या नृपतेः कलत्रमितरे संपत्सु चापत्सु च <ls>Mu. 1. 15.</ls> {@--3@} Good fortune, happiness, luck. {@--4@} Success, fulfilment, accomplishment of desired objects; <ls>Ś. 7. 30.</ls> {@--5@} Perfection, excellence; as in रूपसंपद्; <ls>Śi. 3. 35.</ls> {@--6@} Richness, plenty, exuberance, abundance, excess; तुषारवृष्टिक्षतपद्मसंपदां <ls>Ku. 5. 27</ls>; <ls>R. 10. 59.</ls> {@--7@} Treasure. {@--8@} An advantage, a benefit, blessing. {@--9@} Advancement in good qualities. {@--10@} Decoration. {@--11@} Right method. {@--12@} A necklace of pearls
